snippet.title: POLYARIS Announcement Teaser | Upcoming Survival Game
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2979810/POLYARIS/ 

Polyaris is a single-player, first-person survival skiing upcoming PC game set in a post-apocalyptic frozen open world. Survive the cold, ski through snowy forests, find food and water, fend off wild animals, and uncover the mystery of why you are the last one alive.

Join our Discord for the  latest updates: https://discord.gg/gpzMsxwYXp

The main core game mechanics will include:
- Surviving in the frozen post-apocalyptic open world
- Skiing
- Extraction elements
- Looting
- Fighting wild animals

The early access release is set for the end of 2024.

Welcome to the Frozen Apocalypse

Step into the harsh, frozen aftermath of a nuclear disaster in POLYARIS, a single-player, first-person survival PvE skiing game with extraction elements. The world as you knew it is gone, replaced by an endless expanse of ice and snow. Your journey begins now.
Master the Art of Survival

Ski across icy terrains and navigate through dense, snowy forests. Your survival depends on your ability to find food and water, as well as gathering other vital supplies. Every decision you make could mean the difference between life and death.
Confront Fierce Wildlife

The frozen wilderness is not empty. Predatory animals lurk in the shadows, ready to attack. You must fend off these wild beasts while managing your own dwindling resources. Are you prepared to face these dangers head-on?
Uncover the Mystery

As you traverse this desolate world, you will uncover clues that hint at why you are the last one alive. Piece together the story of the apocalypse and discover the secrets hidden beneath the ice. Will you find the answers you seek?
A Unique Survival Experience

POLYARIS offers a unique blend of skiing and survival mechanics, set in an immersive open world. Experience the thrill of exploring an icy wasteland, the tension of surviving against all odds, and the satisfaction of uncovering a gripping mystery. Are you ready to take on the challenge?
